name: Antiracist [Little ∅ne #2]
description:
Ever wondered what makes resignification meaningful?

Saying "fuck you" for those who equate tradition with the normalization of death. Scholarliness takes the sword of Ethics and monopolizes it into a single history, a single colonial warmonger and egocentric history, which shan't be questioned by scum. Slavers are the true scum. That's why cosmic forces have no Father, and we can call any absurdist poem Kafkian or gross, mad-infested fiction Lovecraftian. Fuck racism and fuck imperialism!

The devil is in the details.

Twitter @pedioscorides IG @pdioscorides
